channel.title: dotnet on Coding with Hans
channel.description: Recent content in dotnet on Coding with Hans

item.title: How sharp do you C#? (.NET Assemble! event presentation)
item.description: With the release of .NET 7 this week, a new language version of C# is also released. This is the 11th version of the C# language, and adds some nice features for developers.

item.title: C# 11 - Static Abstract Members
item.description: With the release of .NET 7 next November, a new language version of C# will also be released. This will be the 11th version of the C# language, and adds some nice features for developers.

item.title: C# 11 - Required members
item.description: With the release of .NET 7 next November, a new language version of C# will also be released. This will be the 11th version of the C# language and adds some nice features for developers.

item.title: C# 11 - Raw string literals
item.description: With the release of .NET 7 next November, a new version of C# will also be released. This will be the 11th version of the C# language and adds some nice features for developers.

item.title: Blazor Game Development - part 3
item.description: During these summer days I thought it would be nice to do a bit of fun programming beside my normal programming job. When thinking about this I realized that during my study time I once developed a side scrolling platform game in C++.

item.title: Blazor Game Development - part 2
item.description: During these summer days I thought it would be nice to do a bit of fun programming beside my normal programming job. When thinking about this I realized that during my study time I once developed a side scrolling platform game in C++.

item.title: Blazor Game Development - part 1
item.description: During these summer days I thought it would be nice to do a bit of fun programming beside my normal programming job. When thinking about this I realized that during my study time I once developed a side scrolling platform game in C++.

item.title: My thoughts on C# 9.0
item.description: At the Microsoft build 2020 conference last week a lot of new and exciting announcements were made. One topic was about the new features that are added to the C# language in version 9.

item.title: C# 8.0 features
item.description: Met de komst van .NET Core 3.0 in september zet Microsoft een nieuwe stap voor het .NET platform. In mijn blog over de nieuwe features in .
